short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Restore the old icon on Meet, Calendar and Gmail to make tabs more recognizable

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension restore the old icon on Meet, Calendar and Gmail to make tabs more recognizable. That increases accessibility.

Super simple :) nothing more.
